segments.text: I can't help but stare at this chaotic kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying that plate, completely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink is a waterfall disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring everywhere, ruining the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in it and doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar like bandits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a teetering stool, hand stuffed in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for her cookie with that hopeful look.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end in tears or a broken bone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, making the whole area a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks perfect, mocking the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she'd turn around and stop this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies aren't worth the risk, kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a typical family moment, full of hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
